name: Moscow Mule
description: The Moscow Mule, a zesty mix of vodka, ginger beer, and lime served in a distinctive copper mug, was concocted in the 1940s in Los Angeles. This cocktail was pivotal in popularizing vodka in the United States during the mid-20th century. Its characteristic mug and spicy-sweet flavor profile make it a unique, unforgettable classic.
instructions: Fill a copper mug or similarly sized glass with ice.
Pour in the vodka and lime juice.
Fill the glass with ginger beer and gently swirl it with a spoon once to mix.
Garnish with a lime lime wheel and mint.
